Package inkball

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    App  
    Ball
    The ball class inherits from the abstract GameObject class.
    Board
    Board class represents the game board and contains the tiles, balls, spawners, holes, and the game state manager.
    GameObject
    Abstract class for all objects that are spawned on the board such as the ball, tiles (walls), holes and spawners.
    GameStateManager
    This class manages the game state, including the current state of the game, the score, the timer, and the time to spawn new balls.
    Hole
    Hole class represents the holes on the board where the balls are captured.
    HUD
    The HUD class is responsible for drawing the Heads-Up Display (HUD) of the game.
    Level
    The Level class represents a game level.
    Line
    The Line class represents a user-drawn line in the game.
    LineSegment
    This class represents a line segment in the game.
    Spawner
    The spawner class is a subclass of the GameObject class, it represents the spawner object in the game, which spawns ball objects at regular intervals based on the ballsToSpawn list
    Tile
    The Tile class represents each tile on the game board.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    GameStateManager.GameState  
    Tile.TileType
